content.query:
USE Demo

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='BoobooBooboo!';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL BlobCred 
WITH 
  IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
  SECRET = 'sv=2021-06-08&st=2022-11-20T21%3A06%3A29Z&se=2022-11-21T21%3A06%3A29Z&sr=c&sp=rl&sig=UdUZPLP1tLFIqNuRh8LVnb0zGBGHtJhj%2FgE8hEIzkF0%3D';

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE BlueBadge
WITH 
  (LOCATION = 'https://bluebadgegen22sa.dfs.core.windows.net/bluebadgegen2fs',
  CREDENTIAL = BlobCred)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT BBIParquet
WITH
    (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE FlightData(
    DayOfMonth INTEGER,
    DayOfWeek INTEGER,
    DepTime VARCHAR(50),
    CRSDepTime VARCHAR(50),
    ArrTime VARCHAR(50),
    CRSArrTime VARCHAR(50),
    UniqueCarrier VARCHAR(50),
    FlightNum VARCHAR(50),
    TailNum VARCHAR(50),
    ActualElapsedTime INTEGER,
    CRSElapsedTime INTEGER,
    AirTime INTEGER, 
    ArrDelay INTEGER,
    DepDelay INTEGER,
    Origin VARCHAR(50),
    Destination VARCHAR(50),
    Distance INTEGER,
    TaxiIn INTEGER,
    TaxiOut INTEGER,
    Cancelled BIT,
    CancelledCode VARCHAR(50),
    Diverted BIT,
    CarrierDelay VARCHAR(50),
    WeatherDelay VARCHAR(50),
    NASDelay VARCHAR(50),
    SecurityDelay VARCHAR(50),
    LateAircraftDelay VARCHAR(50),
    IsArrDelayed BIT,
    IsDepDelayed BIT,
    Year INTEGER,
    Month INTEGER
)
WITH (
  LOCATION = 'flightpq4',
  DATA_SOURCE = BlueBadge,
  FILE_FORMAT = BBIParquet
)
